data.title: Metro Nashville Public Schools
data.meta_description: The 2024-2025 MNPS Optional Schools application window is from January 22 to February 9.
data.text:
A School For Every Student

Metro Schools offer a wide variety of unique academic programs, supports, and extracurricular activities in locations that span the city, ensuring students have access to the tools they need to thrive and be successful.

MNPS is home to 160 schools and a community of dedicated teachers and administrators who provide students with the education they deserve.

Partnering with you and your family, we want to provide your child with a complete educational experience that allows them to graduate prepared for success in college, the professional world, and life. MNPS offers personalized learning Pre-K - 12, making sure every student is known and supported.

Families can choose from their zoned school, apply to a charter school, or select a school outside their neighborhood or zone through the school options process.

Visit the district maps page for more schools, cluster, optional schools maps.

Optional schools are listed by grade tier on this page, as well.

2024-2025 School Year Application

The application period for the 2024-2025 school year for a priority seat was January 22 to February 9.

All families must create a new account on SchoolMint before submitting an application.

Watch the videos on this page for instructions on creating the account and submitting the application. Text transcription also is provided.

New to the District or Switching Schools?

We accept, at any time, optional schools applications from students who are new to MNPS or currently enrolled in an MNPS school but would like to apply to a charter that participates in our district's optional school application process.

You can begin the application on the SchoolMint online portal. 2024-2025 Optional Schools Application
